H0.text: Who was the first person in the bible to get drunk. Lot

H1.text: Who was the first person in the bible to get drunk. Nabal

H2.text: Who was the first person in the bible to get drunk. Esau

H3.text: Who was the first person in the bible to get drunk. Noah

A4.text: Alcoholic beverages appear in the Hebrew Bible, after Noah planted a vineyard and became inebriated.
